jutils

Class Dates

  • java.lang.Object
    • jutils.Dates

  • public class Dates
extends java.lang.Object
    The Dates class brings together some common date conversion functionality with error checking. Nothing is stored, but conversions between short formats (yyyy-MM-dd) and the Java Date class are provided.

        public java.util.Date dateFromString(java.lang.String indate)
        Converts a string date to a Date value returns the date value, if it is invalid, returns null
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Date value of the converted date string, or null if error

        public java.lang.String dateToString(java.util.Date inDate)
        converts a Date to a string date; returning the date value as a string.

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • dateToFullString

        public java.lang.String dateToFullString(java.util.Date inDate)
        converts a Date to a string date; returning the date value as a string.
        If the date is null, returns an empty string
        If the date invalid, returns null
        This returns the date and time, resolution based on the input date
        Parameters:
        inDate - Date to be converted
        Returns:
        String value of the input Date

      • addMonths

        public java.util.Date addMonths(java.util.Date inDate,
                                int months)
        Returns a date value equal to the number of months added in the parameter. parameter can be positive or negative. If the input date is null, returns a null date
        If the date invalid, returns null
        Parameters:
        inDate - starting Date value
        months - integer number of months to add (positive or negative)
        Returns:
        Date value of the resulting date

      • inactiveDate

        public java.util.Date inactiveDate(int months)
        Returns a date value equal to the current Date plus the number of months passed as an integer. Parameter can be positive or negative.
        Parameters:
        months - integer number of months to add (positive or negative) to today's date
        Returns:
        Date value of the resulting date

      • getVersion

        public static java.lang.String getVersion()
        Returns the version number of this class.
        Returns:
        string value of version number

      • getAllVersions

        public static java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAllVersions(java.util.LinkedHashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> vlist)
        Returns list of mapped pairs of class file names and the version number. It also adds all called routines to the list. If the class file name and version is already in the list, it does not add them, it simply returns.
        Parameters:
        vlist - Map of the current class/versions to be appended to
        Returns:
        Map of the class/version values for this and all called routines
